couplets.s:
I met you on a sunny day
Under the sky so blue
Our love blossomed in every way
And I knew it was true

We danced under the moonlight
With stars as our guide
You held me so tight
In your arms, I wanted to hide

The waves whispered secrets of the sea
As we walked along the shore
Hand in hand, just you and me
Forever, I'll ask for nothing more

In my dreams, I fly so high
Above the clouds, up in the sky
With you, there's no need to cry
In this world, I'll never say goodbye

Walking hand in hand through the rain
Our love, a never-ending chain
Through joy and sorrow, we remain
In our hearts, the eternal flame

Going hand in hand through the sun
Our love, a never-ending road
Under the stars, we make our way
In the night, we find our escape
In your love, I long to stay
In your arms, there's no need to reshape

The city lights are shining bright
As we stroll through the night
With you, everything feels so right
In your arms, I found my light

In this urban jungle, we explore
Every moment, I want to savor and store
With you, life is never a bore
In your love, I always want more

Beneath the neon sky so grand
We'll walk the streets, hand in hand
In your smile, I'll forever stand
With you, life is simply grand

In the meadow, flowers bloom
Underneath the bright full moon
In your smile, there's no gloom
Together, we'll dance and swoon

Hand in hand, we'll chase the breeze
Through the forest, under the trees
In your love, I find my ease
Forever, I want you to please

As the seasons change and we grow old
Our memories, like precious gold
In your heart, I've found my hold
With you, I'll never be cold

Beneath the velvet sky so clear
With you, I have nothing to fear
In your arms, I hold dear
Our love, forever sincere

In the quiet of the night
We find our own delight
With you, everything's right
In your love, my heart takes flight

In the album of my mind
Golden memories I find
With you, happiness intertwined
In your love, my heart's entwined

Through the years, we've grown
In your love, I've known
A life that's truly shown
With you, my heart's been sown

In the warmth of your embrace
I've found my special place
With you, there's no need to chase
Our love, an eternal embrace

In the silence of the night
Our hearts take their flight
In your love, everything's right
With you, my dreams are bright

In the whispers of the heart
Our love's a work of art
With you, I never want to depart
In your embrace, I'll never be apart

With every beat, our love does grow
In your eyes, our future does show
In your love, I find my glow
With you, my heart's in tow

As the sun sets in the west
In your love, I'm truly blessed
With you, I've passed the test
In your arms, I'm at my best

In the colors of the evening sky
With you, I'll reach so high
In your love, I'll never say goodbye
With you, forever I'll comply

In the ocean's gentle tide
With you, I want to ride
In your love, I'll never hide
With you, I'm on this endless glide

As the waves crash on the shore
With you, I want nothing more
In your love, I'll always soar
With you, life's an endless explore

Beneath the moon's gentle glow
We dance where the wildflowers grow
In your arms, I want to go
Our love, like a river, will always flow

Whispers of the night in your ear
Our love, like music, you'll hear
With you, I have nothing to fear
In your embrace, I hold you dear

The stars above, a radiant sight
In your eyes, I find my light
With you, every moment is right
In your love, my heart takes flight

In your arms, I find my place
In the warmth of your embrace
In your eyes, I see your grace
With you, I've found my eternal chase

Our love, a story to unfold
In your heart, my dreams are told
With you, I'll never grow old
In your love, I'll always hold

In your love, I've found my guide
With you, I'll always stay beside
In your arms, my fears subside
In your love, I'll always confide

Through the storms, we'll find our way
In your love, there's nothing to sway
In your arms, I want to lay
With you, I'll cherish every day

In the quiet of the night
In your love, I find my light
With you, everything feels so right
In your arms, I take flight

Whispers of the heart in the dark
In your love, I've found my spark
With you, I'll always embark
In your embrace, I'll never hark

In the stillness, we find our way
In your love, my fears allay
With you, I'll forever stay
In your arms, come what may

In the silence, our love will swell
In your love, all is well
With you, every moment is a spell
In your embrace, my heart will dwell
